go_data.justification: Smad3 activation modulates miR-23b-3p and miR-27b-3p expression.
Smad3 signalling pathway was activated in Ang-II-treated HAFs to promote atrial fibrosis.
Smad3 accumulated in the nuclei of HAFs after transfection with miR-23b-3p, miR-27b-3p and TGFBR3 siRNA.
Smad3 activation modulates miR-23b-3p and miR-27b-3p expression through the Smad3 signalling pathway.
The phosphorylation level of Smad3 was significantly increased in HAFs at 10 minutes in response to Ang-II treatment.
